1 Thank You for Contributing. #if (!$currDocName) #set($currDocName = $request.curr_doc) #end #if ($currDocName) #set($currDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($currDocName)) #set($amng = $xwiki.getPlugin("asset_manager")) #messageboxstart("Asset completed" "red") #if($amng.isComplet($currDoc)) To edit any of the information, please select the edit button for the information you would like to change. Here's how your content will look to members and visitors.
This learning resource is now in your [personal collection>$context.user].
#if ($currDoc.web=="AssetTemp") #set($asset = $amng.publishAsset($currDoc)) #else #set($asset = $currDoc) #end your can see your contribution: [$asset.title>$asset.fullName] #else You asset is not complet #end #messageboxend() #end
